name: Charge (Ohmaigawd)
description:
Meet Charge!

The guardian of your battery. He resides in your phone and when times get tough he steps in as a power saver.

Avoid falling obstacles for as long as possible.

Controls: 

A/D - Left/Right

W/Space - Jump   

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 39 in 72 hours

Team:

Art:  Maja Vavpotič 

(@majavavpotic, majavavpotic@gmail.com)

Development:  Tilen Pogačnik 

( @TilenPogacnik, tilenpogacnik94@gmail.com)

Music and sound effects:  João Gabriel Gulman Rodrigues 

(http://www.joaogabrielrodrigues.com/)
